com.company

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A Room is a "location" in the adventure game. A room has a name, a description, a column, and a row.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeremy Wolff

        roomRow - row number of the room.
        roomColumn - column number of the room.
        roomName - name of the room.
        roomDescription - a detailed description of what the player can see in the room.
